= Installation AymaraMorph =
How to install the AymaraMorph.
  # Download AymaraMorph from [http://www.dropbox.com/s/uq8d0sb2vlujazf/AymaraMorphAnalyzerRelease.tar.gz here]
  # Download XFST from the following url  http://www.stanford.edu/~laurik/.book2software/ 
  # Extract the contents from bin.tar.gz and copy the contents as follows:
{{{
$ cp xfst /usr/bin/
$ cp bin/lexc /usr/bin/
$ cp bin/lookup /usr/bin/
$ cp bin/tokenize /usr/bin/
$ cp bin/twolc /usr/bin/
}}}
  # Install libxml-twig-perl
{{{
$ sudo apt-get install libxml-twig-perl
}}}
  # Compile AymaraMorph.
